title: Parsley Health Raises $26m in Series B Funding
text:
Parsley Health, a New York-based personalized holistic health services startup, raised $26m in Series B funding.

The round was led by White Star Capital, joined by FirstMark Capital, Amplo, Alpha Edison Partners, Arkitekt Ventures, and Galaxy Digital.

The company intends to use the funds to continue to expand operations and its business reach.

Led by CEO Robin Berzin, MD, Parsley Health is building a new operating system for primary care medicine, which combines modern medicine and smart technology with a functional, whole body approach. The company’s doctors and health coaches combine nutrition, lifestyle changes, and testing to get to the root of symptoms. They operate in NY, LA and SF.

FinSMEs
description: Parsley Health, a New York-based personalized holistic health services startup, raised $26m in Series B funding. The round was led by White Star Capital
